body.h1: Problem Creation Tools for edX Authors
body.p: A number of scripts are available to assist edX authors in creation of problems. These include:
body.pre: latex2edx -- a set of scripts for converting latex-format problem sets into edX format word2edx -- a set of scripts for importing microsoft Word format problem sets into edX format
body.p: These tools are rather rudimentary at this point in time, but they have already been tested on files from at least one course. None of these tools automates the process of generating good assessment problems, ie with proper problem checking code, and well framed questions.
